document.full_text: bahrain's foreign minister said on monday saudi and uae forces called in to help quell street unrest would leave only when "any external threat" he associated with iran was seen to be gone.
document.title: gulf troops staying until iran "threat" gone: bahrain
lines_and_colors: bahrain's foreign minister said on monday saudi and uae forces called in to help quell street unrest would leave only when "any external threat" he associated with iran was seen to be gone.
